title: The International Bad Boys Hour Ep 60: The Party Continues With Darren Carter and John Mitchell
description:
******Instant Classic Alert**********
The International Bad Boys are back and the studio is packed. The boys welcome International Bad Boy Darren Carter to the show. Darren's awesome new comedy CD, The Party Continues, is available on iTunes. Then the guys welcome the hilarious John Mitchell to the show. John talks about his time being the Weed Lord of Portland Oregon back in the day which was 2006! John brings the best out of the crew, Steve flamboyantly declares "He's bringing out the greatness!" All of this and more on another insanely awesome episode of The International Bad Boys Hour! Please let us know what you think of the show, positive or negative! Please rate and review the show on iTunes! Stay black motherfuckers!
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
